resources.string: Activating USB mode will deactivate Bluetooth. Continue?
Checking for Samsung Kies (PC connection software)…
Security policy prevents use of computer connection.
MTP application will restart to prepare SD card. Continue?
Your connection has been automatically changed to USB 2.0 because it has been inactive for %d minutes. To use USB 3.0, open USB options via the notification panel and select media device (USB 3.0).

This device has not been recognized by the connected computer. Windows XP Service Pack 3 or higher and Mac OS X 10.5 or higher are supported. Windows Media Player version 10 or higher must be installed to connect to Microsoft Windows, or Android File Transfer must be installed for Mac OS X. To sync, back up, and restore data, and upgrade your device, download Samsung Smart Switch for Windows or Mac OS X from http://www.samsung.com/smartswitch.

Unable to find software on your PC that can recognize your device. Service pack 3, Windows Media Player, version 11 or higher, or Samsung USB Driver for Windows XP, or Android file transfer for Mac OS must be installed (see www.microsoft.com or www. android.com/filetransfer).
An MTP connection will be established to access the data on the connected device.

"The connected device is unable to access data on this device. Reconnect the USB cable and try again.
Android File Transfer must be installed on Mac OS X devices. To download Android File Transfer, go to %s."

"The connected device is unable to access data on this device. Reconnect the USB cable and try again.
Android File Transfer or Samsung Smart Switch must be installed on Mac OS X devices. To download Android File Transfer, go to %1$s, or to download Samsung Smart Switch, go to %2$s."
The connected device will be able to access files on this phone (MTP connection).
The connected device will be able to access files on this tablet (MTP connection).

"The connected device is unable to access data on this device. Reconnect the USB cable and try again.
Samsung Smart Switch must be installed on Mac OS X devices. To download Samsung Smart Switch, go to %s."
The connected device will be able to access data on this phone.
The connected device will be able to access data on this tablet.
